info.name: info
info.description: Returns information about the bots' creators

configuration.name: changeprefix
configuration.description:
Changes bot's prefix on server
**NOTE:** only server admins can run this

configuration.name: register
configuration.description: Registers your account to the bot, so you don't have to type your username everytime

configuration.name: setuniverse
configuration.description:
Registers your account to the given TypeRacer universe; subsequent command calls will use it
**NOTE:** Your account must be linked first

basic.name: stats
basic.description: Returns basic account stats for given user

basic.name: getdata
basic.description: Downloads given user's entire race history (may take several minutes); caps at 5,000 for non-admins

basic.name: today
basic.description: Returns given user's stats on a given day; defaults to current UTC day

alt_example.notes: The date can be specified if a `date` in the form YYYY-MM-DD is provided

basic.name: realspeed
basic.description: Returns unlagged and adjusted speeds for the given user / race

alt_example.notes: Returns given user's latest race if `race_num` is not provided
Returns real speeds for given race URL

basic.name: realspeedaverage
basic.description: Returns average unlagged and adjusted speeds over a given race interval; caps at 20 races for non-admins

alt_example.notes: Returns average of user's last `num` races if only 1 number is provided
Returns average of user's last 10 races if only a username is provided

basic.name: leaderboard
basic.description: Returns the top 10 users in a given category

alt_example.notes: Returns the leaderboard for text top `num`s; defaults to 10 otherwise

basic.name: competition
basic.description: Returns the (updated) top 10 users for current daily competition; sorted by points as default

basic.name: lastonline
basic.description: Returns the time since given user's last race (play universe)

basic.name: medals
basic.description: Displays a given user's medal breakdown

basic.name: toptens
basic.description: Returns the number of text top 10s for a given user

advanced.name: top
advanced.description: Returns top 10 best results for given user in given category

advanced.name: worst
advanced.description: Returns top 10 worst results for given user in given category

advanced.name: personalbest
advanced.description: Returns statistics on given user on a given text

alt_example.notes: Returns statistics for given user's last raced text

advanced.name: racedetails
advanced.description: Returns detailed breakdown of a user's account

advanced.name: unraced
advanced.description: Returns 5 randomly selected unraced texts for given user

alt_example.notes: Returns 5 randomly selected unraced texts with length less than `length` for given user

advanced.name: textsunder
advanced.description: Returns 5 randomly selected texts under `wpm` for given user

alt_example.notes: Returns 5 randomly selected texts under `wpm` and with length less than `length` for given user

advanced.name: textsoverorequal
advanced.description: Returns the number and percentage of texts typed over specified parameter

alt_example.notes: Category defaults to `wpm` if none is provided

advanced.name: racesover
advanced.description: Returns the number and percentage of races over specified parameter

alt_example.notes: Category defaults to `wpm` if none is provided

advanced.name: milestone
advanced.description: Returns the date and race upon which the given user achieved the given milestone

advanced.name: marathon
advanced.description: Returns the most races completed a given user completed in a given length of time, `seconds` being the maximum amount of time allowed between races before a session ends

alt_example.notes: `seconds` defaults to 1 day if it is not provided

advanced.name: sessionstats
advanced.description: Returns the highest race count and longest time session for the given user, `seconds` being the maximum amount of time allowed between races before a session ends

alt_example.notes: `seconds` defaults to 30 minutes if it is not provided

advanced.name: fastestcompletion
advanced.description: Returns the fastest the given user completed the given number of races

advanced.name: boxplot
advanced.description: Returns WPM box plots for up to 4 users

alt_example.notes: Up to 4 users can be graphed

advanced.name: histogram
advanced.description: Returns WPM histogram for the given user

advanced.name: raceline
advanced.description: Returns WPM histogram for the given user

alt_example.usage: keegant e6f4e37l deroche1 wordracer888 mark40511 chimchimchim jessegarcia lucean oneguardsam pentalon
alt_example.notes: Up to 10 users can be graphed

other.name: search
other.description: Returns a list of all quotes containing given search query; each query must be at least 3 words long; query is case insensitive

other.name: levenshtein
other.description: Returns the top 5 quotes with the lowest Levenshtein distance from the given query; each query must be at most 40 characters long; query is case sensitive

other.name: searchid
other.description: Returns the text of the specified ID

other.name: unixreference
other.description: Returns table of UNIX time conversions

alt_example.notes: UNIX timestamp can be given as either an integer or scientific notation

other.name: premium
other.description: Verifies premium membership to grant Discord role

other.name: verify
other.description: Verifies premium membership to grant Discord role
